text:
Paul was a great host. The room was exactly how it appears on the listing, and the apartment is gorgeous. He was prepared with a little “welcome packet" of info (where to find things, keys, WiFi info, etc.), and was really great to talk to.

Location wise, the apartment is right in the middle of Boreum Hill with easy access to — well — everything. It was easy to get in and out when you needed to. An absolutely perfect spot.

And last but not least: parking. Most people visiting Brooklyn might be flying in, etc., but I drove up from Baltimore. Luckily, there was a garage literally a block away and I only paid ~$50 for 3 days. Amazing.

Highly recommended.
listing_name: Spacious room in cozy Boerum Hill
